url.description: Base publication url (ex: https://standard.site). The canonical document URL is formed by combining this value with the document path.

icon.description: Square image to identify the publication. Should be at least 256x256.

basicTheme.description: Simplified publication theme for tools and apps to utilize when displaying content.

preferences.description: Object containing platform specific preferences (with a few shared properties).

main.description: A publication record representing a blog, website, or content platform. Publications serve as containers for documents and define the overall branding and settings.

showInDiscover.description: Boolean which decides whether the publication should appear in discovery feeds.

preferences.description: Platform-specific preferences for the publication, including discovery and visibility settings.
